name: Goat's Tale
description:
Goat's Tale is a precise platformer with unique physics, in which the player takes on the role of a famous treasure hunter, whose goal is to get to the top of all four lands to find wonderful treasures!

Overwiew


- Goat's Tale doesn't forgive mistakes.

Each jump will have to be carefully thought out and a minor mistake may cause you to fall to the very bottom.

- Explore the world.

You can collect additional treasures on each map, thanks to which you can unlock new versions of the maps and more!

- Challenge your friends.

The game will also offer a local competitive mode, in which the player can challenge his friends for the title of the fastest goat or take part in duels for who will get the most points.

Goat's Tale are:




  • Immersive Gameplay.

  • Beautiful pixelart graphics.

  • Possibility to compete with friends (locally).

  • A challenge for the best players.

  • Fall Hours. Seriously.
